Package Appointment

Class AppointmentSlotManager

Object
AppointmentSlotManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
AppointmentSlotService
public class AppointmentSlotManager extends Object implements AppointmentSlotService
The AppointmentSlotManager class provides functionality for managing appointment slots, including updating availability, creating new slots, and viewing available slots.

This class interacts with DataProcessor to manage data in the "AvailabilitySlot_List.csv" file.

Since:
2024-11-15
Version:
1.0
Author:
Lee Xing Juan Rennie

  • Method Details

    • setAppointmentAvailability

      public void setAppointmentAvailability(String appointmentSlotID, String availability)
      Updates the availability of an existing appointment slot based on the slot ID.
      Specified by:
      setAppointmentAvailability in interface AppointmentSlotService
      Parameters:
      appointmentSlotID - The ID of the appointment slot to update.
      availability - The new availability status (e.g., "Available", "Booked").

    • setAppointmentAvailability

      public void setAppointmentAvailability(String doctorID, String doctorName, String appointmentDate, String appointmentTime, String availability)
      Creates a new appointment slot for a doctor and assigns an appointment slot ID.
      Specified by:
      setAppointmentAvailability in interface AppointmentSlotService
      Parameters:
      doctorID - The ID of the doctor.
      doctorName - The name of the doctor.
      appointmentDate - The date of the appointment slot.
      appointmentTime - The time of the appointment slot.
      availability - The availability status of the slot (e.g., "Available").

    • viewAvailableAppointmentSlots

      public void viewAvailableAppointmentSlots()
      Displays all available appointment slots for patients. Only slots marked as "Available" are displayed.
      Specified by:
      viewAvailableAppointmentSlots in interface AppointmentSlotService
